tracking_swiftclaw.name: Tracking Swiftclaw
tracking_swiftclaw.description: Successful leads and ground gained while hunting Swiftclaw

shehai_cold_snow_awakening.name: Shehai Awakening — Cold Snow

shehai_cold_snow_awakening.completion_effect: Shehai reaches full awakening (Level 4/4); unlocks all stunt slots
advancement_triggers: Significant Milestone: Finish Companions Storyline Act I (+1)
Major narrative moment of soul-forging or personal breakthrough (+1)
GM award for exceptional roleplay of Ansei discipline (+1)
